title: It said i was AFK but i wasn't
body:
So i got a thing after the game that said i was afk/left the game and i needed to type I AGREE, But i was never afk nor did i leave????

Was it because i went 0-10?

replies.body: i didnt, i played the whole game so once again why would it give me that message?
Getting flagged for "AFK'ing" is not limited to the original meaning, "Away from Keyboard". It includes idling in the base for too long and/or not contributing to the team.
Do you have a job? Or do you just collect welfare and sit on your ass all day living off our taxes?
I really think people are dumb on here, I never went afk nor did I leave.
Did you just kinda click around a tower or the fountain doing nothing for a minute or so? That could be considered AFK

chat: im afk
reality: lulz jk
rito: have ban

thats how it works the 0/10 which is probably a result of crappy troll allies is something that reinforces the report especially if it happens often

Nope, it was because you AFKed. AFKing is any time over about a minute spent not playing the game, you cannot ragequit and come back just before the game ends and expect to be ok. Learn some control and be a good sport.
